x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Probe for checking for Hierarchy breakages or mistakes that lead to maps not loading in reservations or space related applications. Should go through from the location level and make sure the string of hierarchy goes all the way to the highest level for each.
Checks for Locations having an associated space, checks that the space and location are either both active or both inactive, and checks if the location has a parent record.
Need to add functionality in later releases to separate checks for spaces and locations.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Location Hierarchy Check
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: If the error mesage says there is no space record, change space creation business rule to on change, edit all locations that are missing, and then turn back to on insert only. If the error message says there is no parent, add the correct floor record to the location in question. If the error message says there is an issue with activity, change either the space or location to the other's so they are the same.
